description: Master index for disassembly simulation experiments

experiments.name: Baseline Workshop - Pull Mode
experiments.description: Single workshop with pull material flow, standard quality

experiments.name: Workshop - Push Mode
experiments.description: Single workshop with push material flow for comparison

experiments.name: Parallel Stations Load Balancing
experiments.description: Parallel disassembly stations with high volume

experiments.name: Quality and Missing Components
experiments.description: Demonstrate condition-based decisions and missing components

experiments.name: Baseline Workshop - Pull Mode (No Quality)
experiments.description: Single workshop with pull material flow, no quality restrictions

experiments.name: Baseline Workshop - Pull Mode (Strict Quality)
experiments.description: Single workshop with pull material flow, strict quality requirements

experiments.name: Validation Scenario 01
experiments.description: 3 stations, mixed quality (RD/TL/SA), sequential flow - calibrated with S1 data

experiments.name: Validation Scenario 02
experiments.description: 4 parallel stations, HD only, parallel processing - calibrated with S2 data

experiments.name: Validation Scenario 03
experiments.description: 5 sequential stations, HD only - calibrated with S3 data

experiments.name: Validation Scenario 03 (Sensitivity)
experiments.description: 5 sequential stations, HD only - VUT-based queue delay adjustment (Hopp & Spearman, 2008, eq. 8.25)

experiments.name: Validation Scenario 04
experiments.description: 5 stations with buffer, HD only - calibrated with S4 data

experiments.name: Validation Scenario 05
experiments.description: 5 stations, mixed quality - calibrated with S5 data

experiments.name: Validation Scenario 06
experiments.description: 5 stations, mixed quality routing (SA/RD/HD/TL) - calibrated with S6 data

experiments.name: Validation Scenario 06 (Sensitivity)
experiments.description: 5 stations, mixed quality - WS-02 load calibrated to match real throughput (RT/FT reduced 20%)
